tool.name: Tomo Find Center
tool.description: Find rotation axis centers for the tomography stacks
tool.command: mkdir tomo_find_center_plots; cp $input_file reduced.nex && cp $tool_config find_center.yaml && CHAP --config $__tool_directory__/pipeline_find_center.yaml

configfiles.configfile: #slurp #if str($center_rows.type_selector) == "enter_range" #echo 'lower_row: ' + str($center_rows.low) # #echo 'upper_row: ' + str($center_rows.upp) # #end if #echo 'gaussian_sigma: ' + str($gaussian_sigma) # #echo 'ring_width: ' + str($ring_width) #

param.name: type_selector
param.label: Choose axis center image rows
param.option: Use the first and last detector row
Manually enter the center image rows

param.name: gaussian_sigma
param.label: Standard deviation for the Gaussian filter

param.name: ring_width
param.label: Maximum filtered ring width in pixels

tool.help:
usage: PROG [-h] [--config CONFIG] [--verbose]
options: -h, --help show this help message and exit --config CONFIG Input configuration file --verbose verbose output
